description: FastAPI-based proxy that forwards Google Gemini and OpenAI requests with dual key management and a SvelteKit dashboard.

completed_features: JWT-based authentication and user API key CRUD under /api/auth and /api/auth_keys
Service key pool with SQLite persistence, cooldown handling, and background state recovery
Proxy endpoints for OpenAI-compatible chat/completions at /v1 and Gemini endpoints at /v1beta with streaming support
Request logging with SSE realtime feed, searchable request logs, and statistics endpoints for charts
Concurrency management, resilient HTTP client setup, and automatic DB migrations on startup
SvelteKit frontend with login flow, key management screens, request log viewer, stats dashboard, and realtime log viewer

conventions.coding_style: PEP8 with strict type hints, guard clauses, pathlib for paths; uv for dependency management
